p:
The first step was recorded in both decomposition gases on the 50–175 ºC temperature range with a ~ 73.7% mass-loss. The maximum DTG peak was reached at T DTG = 158.1 ºC. The second step was recorded between 175–220 ºC temperature range, with a mass-loss value of ~ 24.1% and a T DTG = 186.7 ºC. For this stage, the DTG curves present an abrupt profile, returning from the maximum point to baseline. Similar behavior was also reported for orange, lemongrass, and basil essential oils by Martins, et al.
15 and for aromatherapy, essential oils by Chen, et al.
13 and was attributed to a zero-order vaporization process.
